html:
2.12.22  6:34 pm   How do you know what to do with your life?

      you get to decide, but if you can't decide then you could retro-decide: live your life and then see what you did

2.12.22  4:20 pm   do you refer to your next song in your next song

      yes

2.12.22  3:24 pm   do you have any predictions for 2032?

      it's a leap year. february 29th will be on a sunday

2.12.22  1:21 pm   how dou you make your videos

      i'm still figuring that out

2.12.22  12:41 pm   what's the best way to change the world?

      remove world from world compartment
      discard
      lightly dust interier of world compartment
      insert new world

2.12.22  11:04 am   What drives you to write music

      vacuum energy

2.12.22  9:52 am   what is inside a black hole

      everything everywhere and everywhen

2.12.22  7:39 am   what does La de da de da de da de day oh wanted to express?

      music, good and bad times, joy, self expression, and understanding

2.12.22  1:32 am   how do i stop myself from looking at everything through some kind of filter (even subconsciously)

      all you can do is change to a different filter. everything is filters. sometimes it may feel like you've cleared the filter, and you'll feel very fresh. this is indeed a fresh filter

2.12.22  1:28 am   i want to be a filmmaker. and I tried to follow your advice to try smaller "version" to somewhat not overwhelm yourself and some kind of other problem to encounter. but I always end up adding more details into it, feeling that it is "too simple". i know that there is something wrong with the reason. what do you think I should do?

      simplifying your work is like getting a haircut. 1 haircut won't last, you have to keep doing it on a regular basis. and it becomes a normal routine of life

2.11.22  11:24 pm   what should my senior quote be

      it should be the same as everyone else's

2.11.22  10:26 pm   What's your favorite hobby outside of music?

      non-music. i specifically like the integration of music and non-music

2.11.22  10:06 pm   how to not feel guilty?

      do something you believe is right

2.11.22  9:36 pm   r songs music 

      let me perform some calculations

2.11.22  8:48 pm   thoughts on maine

      alaska of the east

2.11.22  8:08 pm   it's feb 11, 2022. are you clickin' today?

      just started

2.11.22  7:09 pm   When did you realize you could create things

      just realizing it now

2.11.22  5:28 pm   What's on your mind?

      trying to convince myself that galaxies actually spin correctly

2.11.22  4:38 pm   how to handle time continuing

      change between staying the same and changing

2.11.22  2:40 pm   why dont you ever use capital letters?

      i do, but why don't you

2.11.22  2:28 pm   have you ever started to make something only to realize that you know longer like the thing you're making before it is finished?

     sometimes it feels that way

     How do you move forward in this situation

     there's as many ways as you need, but the real important question is 'why'. And if you've tried everything else: ('switching things', 'doing other things', 'doing shorter things so you never reach this point', 'doing no things', etc every other alternative to what you're doing now) enough times to be sure that all those options are worse, then that could be a reason you'd feel invested in following through on the current one

2.11.22  2:01 pm   when does infinity end?

      some other time. actually that's not true

2.11.22  1:49 pm   Why did the chicken cross the road?

      to see what it's like

2.11.22  12:09 pm   have you ever eaten a pomegranate

      if i did i must have blocked it out of my memory

2.11.22  8:59 am   when is the weekend

      right at the beginning of the week

2.11.22  7:59 am   I have over a dozen songs written. I know I CAN produce and record them. I also know my usual production methods will not satisfy me. There's TOO MUCH ON THE LINE. What do I do to get over this paralysis? 

      try some songs you care less about, for a little while

2.11.22  6:11 am   has a bear ever sat next to you? or have you ever sat next to a bear?

      had to do it the long way, and sit next to myself

2.11.22  5:58 am   what do you think of liechtenstein

      spacious

2.11.22  2:56 am   About to start work on my prom dress what colour fabric do u recommend?

      see if you can get it the exact same color as the room where the prom takes place

2.11.22  2:36 am   favorite onomatopoeia?

      spoof

2.11.22  12:20 am   I'm a fine gentleman requesting you to give a proper credits section at the end of your videos. If you choose to honor my request, you will receive a like and a positive comment from me.

      the credits section is the comments. each person gives themselves credit for their comments

2.10.22  11:57 pm   in a previous answer, you mentioned you played the triangle. what are some other shapes?

      rectangles, .... mostly rectangles

2.10.22  11:53 pm   Pardon me, but is this the Chattanooga Choo Choo?

      no but i can see why you would think that

2.10.22  11:20 pm   I play for less than an hour at rehearsal, is it time to quit

      it depends how long ago you started. if you started more than an hour ago, then the time to quit would have already passed. if you started less than an hour ago, well, the time to quit could be now, or later, you actually didn't specify your exact length of rehearsal so i don't know

2.10.22  9:58 pm   Hey bill, I'm currently in school struggling to find the will to finish up an assignment for a subject I care very little about. Any tips for motivating when you just feel like curling up into a ball?

      it all comes down to what you think the consequences will actually be for not doing it. if you actually think you can handle that, then there's no need to do it. if you can't handle what you think the consequences will be, then you'll do it

2.10.22  9:34 pm   hey bill. i tried to reach out to an ex recently, just to be friends. it had been years since i spoke to them. i hoped the wounds would've healed by now, but they weren't comfortable with it and asked me not to contact them again. am i just clinging on to the past too much and refusing to let go of old regrets?

     maybe

     are they the one clinging to past mistakes and letting them prevent us from creating something new and positive?

     maybe

     anyway that break in 'new canaan' on the 'the season is winter' verse is still gorgeous thank you,

     well that's nice of you

     have a good one

2.10.22  8:43 pm   do you ever write stories that aren't music?

      yes

2.10.22  7:55 pm   how long does it take to make videos in general

      i've never found out

2.10.22  7:49 pm   whats your favorite question you've been asked here?

      this one

2.10.22  7:45 pm   does your next song have the word "must" or "might" in it

      no

2.10.22  7:05 pm   how do i not be afraid of screwing up writing music

      try to screw it up on purpose. there's an art to that, which turns out to be as much fun as doing it good. in fact, statistically, 50% of the time, screwing it up ends up being the key to doing it good

2.10.22  6:49 pm   how much longer will it be before the whole thing changes into a more realistic scene?

      every couple of moments

2.10.22  5:51 pm   I always start a new thing and never finish it. How do I stay focused on a project?

      try smaller ones for a while

2.10.22  4:08 pm   why am i so prone to behaving different when feeling observed

      i blame heisenberg

2.10.22  3:55 pm   so many people ask questions about you using capital letters, but they don't seem to notice that the button they press to ask the question is in capital letters

      that's true

2.10.22  1:30 pm   do you ever get stuck in the past?

      i was stuck in the past, in the past

2.10.22  12:50 pm   Will your next song have singing in it?

      yes

2.10.22  12:02 pm   is it ok to freeze the freezer?

      sure, go ahead

2.10.22  11:55 am   What ISN'T real?

      the only thing not real is the concept of real. Everything else, therefore, is

2.10.22  10:47 am   These days you seem to answer questions only related to music and arts.... What's the reason?

      you may be looking through some kind of a filter
